ai_explanation.introduction_english: In this lesson, let's dive into the fascinating term 'きせつ,' which pops up frequently when discussing the changes in weather and nature throughout the year.
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word 'きせつ' means "season" in English. It refers to the distinct divisions of the year, such as spring, summer, autumn, and winter.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.

examples.kanji: 季節の変わり目は風邪を引きがちです。
examples.furigana: 季節(きせつ)の変(か)わり目(め)は風邪(かぜ)を引(ひ)きがちです。

translations.EN: During the change of seasons, people tend to catch colds.
translations.ID: Selama pergantian musim, orang rentan terkena flu.
translations.ES: Durante el cambio de estación, la gente tiende a resfriarse.
translations.VI: Trong thời kỳ chuyển mùa, người ta có xu hướng bị cảm lạnh.
translations.FR: Pendant le changement de saison, les gens ont tendance à attraper des rhumes.
translations.NE: मौसमको परिवर्तनको क्रममा मानिसहरू चिसो लाग्न सक्छ।
translations.BN: মৌসুমের পরিবর্তনের সময় মানুষ সাধারণত সর্দি ধরে।
translations.ZH: 在季节更替时，人们容易感冒。
translations.KO: 계절이 바뀔 때 감기 걸리기 쉽습니다.
translations.TL: Kapag nagbabago ang panahon, madalas magka-sipon ang mga tao.
translations.MY: ရာသီအပြောင်းအလဲအားဖြင့် လူများသည် အအေးမိစေပါသည်။
translations.HI: मौसम के बदलाव के दौरान लोग सर्दी पकड़ सकते हैं।
translations.AR: أثناء تغيير الفصول، يميل الناس إلى الإصابة بالزكام.
translations.FA: در فصل تغییر، مردم تمایل به سرما خوردن دارند.

examples.furigana: 季節(きせつ)風物(ふうぶつ)を楽し(たの)しむ。

translations.VI: Thưởng thức những điều theo mùa.
translations.TL: Pag-enjoy sa mga bagay na pana-panahon.
translations.MY: ရာသီဥတု အရာများကိုနှစ်သက်ခြင်း။

examples.kanji: 季節の果物を食べたい。
examples.furigana: 季節(きせつ)の果物(くだもの)を食(た)べたい。

translations.EN: I want to eat seasonal fruits.
translations.VI: Tôi muốn ăn trái cây theo mùa.
translations.FR: Je veux manger des fruits de saison.
translations.TL: Gusto kong kumain ng mga prutas ng panahon.
translations.MY: ဣန္ဒြေရှိသီးနှံများကိုစားချင်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मैं मौसमी फल खाना चाहता हूँ।

examples.kanji: 季節の食事が楽しみです。
examples.furigana: 季節(きせつ)の食事(しょくじ)が楽(たの)しみです。

translations.EN: I look forward to the seasonal meal.
translations.ES: Espero con ansias la comida estacional.
translations.VI: Tôi mong đợi bữa ăn theo mùa.
translations.FR: J'ai hâte de déguster le repas de saison.
translations.ZH: 我很期待季节性的餐点。
translations.MY: ရာသီအလိုက် အစားအသောက်ကို စောင့်မျှော်နေပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मैं मौसमी भोजन की प्रतीक्षा कर रहा हूँ।
translations.AR: إنني أتطلع إلى تناول الوجبات الموسمية.

ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonym of the word 'きせつ' is 'じせつ.' While 'きせつ' focuses on the four main periods in a year, 'じせつ' can refer to more specific times or occasions within those periods, like particular months or events.
antonyms: 永久 : えいきゅう : eternity
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonym of the word 'きせつ' is 'えいきゅう,' which means "permanence." While 'きせつ' refers to changes and cycles in a year, 'えいきゅう' suggests something that does not change or last indefinitely.

parts_of_speech: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
